#### Median body size (`ds_median_body_size)`

```{r ds_median_body_size-create}
ds_median_body_size = ds_individuals %>%
  group_by(across(columns_patches),
           file) %>%
  mutate(median_body_size = median(mean_area_µm2)) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  group_by(
    across(columns_patches)
  ) %>%
  summarise(median_body_size = median(mean_area_µm2)) %>%
  ungroup()
```
